summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Corliss Avenue from North 42nd Street to Kilbourne Street et al in the City of Seattle, by constructing water mains, under Ordinance No. 11239, creating Local Improvement District No. 972 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
